name: Mojo XXX
description:
Mojo XXX is a new game in the Mojo series. Updated game mechanics will enable you to look at the magical merge of numbers from a different perspective. Two beautiful girls are ready to keep you company.

Differences from other series of Mojo:
  • Rejection of classical 2048 mechanics based on the sliding of all the tiles of the grid.
  • Two girls instead of one.
  • The game requires a more thoughtful approach. The circular sliding strategy (up – to the right – down – to the left) does not work anymore.
